author: Charles-Tim
created_time: April 19, 2023, 02:00:07 AMLast edit: April 19, 2023, 02:20:49 AM by Charles-Tim
content: Most people here would have known my conclusion, that people should invest in bitcoin, because altcoins are dangerous, most especially the altcoins. But arguably to some altcoins users, they would say some altcoins can pump significantly and dump significantly and that some new projects are getting successful.I am referring to this not because I am interested, but because I saw it on a Nigeria news, the 5 Best Cryptos To Buy For 1000% Growth PotentialMany among us would have read the news. When I read the news, I noticed that digitoad is emphasized more about, I scrolled up back after checking the down part of the news to know if it is sponsor. Not surprisingly, it is a sponsored news.I checked many news sites which are not local news sites, I noticed that digitoad developers are really marketing the meme coin. Is this not another pump and dump scam? The project is getting successful as over $1.4 million has been used to buy the coins during presale and investors are still buying, but hope not another trap. In a pump and dump (scam) project, the project would be successful, but the developers and early investors that bought at low price sell almost all the coins and the price dump for the new investors to lose.My general advice: see altcoins as gambling, invest only the amount of money you can afford to lose, even if you can invest lesser than the amount of money you can afford to lose, it is better that way.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: This is not the first time shitcoins will come with their propaganda, Digitoad is not an exception. The actors behind it must have carefully studied the prevailing market and are using marketing and influencers to propagate it.I've read a lot on the internet and news outlets about the coin, they are only playing their gimmicks to the novice in the game. For how long can this be sustained? I don't know. What I know is that investing my money in Digitoad is a big risk am not willing to take after my experience with coins and tokens.Don't be surprised that there are rich people behind the project, but they won't be able to sustain it for long.
